Hi

I’m Clive Murray - rock guitarist and gentleman adventurer from a land before time. I play guitar, make websites, and write stuff.

Here is some of the aforementioned stuff:

  • The Wheel of Things
  • My band, Indigo Down
  • My blog (including the page for my guitars)
  • My progress on making my second album
  • My Speed-Cubing Timer (not quite finished)
  • My Project Codename Generator
  • My music on iTunes or Amazon

Contact

You can email me on clive@clivemurray.com, should the mood take you.

I’m also on Mastodon — you can get me on @axemonkey@metalhead.club, because Elon Musk is an idiot.

I do still maintain my old twitter handle though I check it less and less, and rarely (if ever) tweet any more.
